plugin.name: testplugin
plugin.summary: Plugin to test examples of the ODAPI and JSON interface for ODRAW
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: testplugin Plugin is used to test out the ODraw API and demonstrate how to use it successfully from another plugin

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for opencpn
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for opencpn
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.author: Jon Gough

The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: testplugin
plugin.summary: Plugin to test examples of the ODAPI and JSON interface for ODRAW
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: testplugin Plugin is used to test out the ODraw API and demonstrate how to use it successfully from another plugin

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and older Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.

plugin.description: Calculates Estimated Positions using tidal harmonics.

plugin.name: testplugin
plugin.summary: Plugin to test examples of the ODAPI and JSON interface for ODRAW
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: testplugin Plugin is used to test out the ODraw API and demonstrate how to use it successfully from another plugin

plugin.name: testplugin
plugin.summary: Plugin to test examples of the ODAPI and JSON interface for ODRAW
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: testplugin Plugin is used to test out the ODraw API and demonstrate how to use it successfully from another plugin

plugin.name: otidalplan
plugin.summary: Estimating Positions using tidal harmonics
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Calculates Estimated Positions using tidal harmonics.

plugin.name: OCPN Draw
plugin.summary: Drawing Plugin to allow extra objects to be drawn and used within OCPN
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: OCPN_DRAW (OD) is a plugin that extends the capability of OCPN to include non-standard object: Boundaries, Boundary Points, Text Points, Dead Reckoning paths, Electronic Bearing Lines (EBL) and Guard Zones. The plugin also has an API to allow other plugins to directly interact with it.

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for opencpn
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.name: UKTides
plugin.summary: Tides for UK Ports
plugin.author: Mike Rossiter
plugin.description: Tides for 600+ UK Ports from the UKHO

plugin.name: windvane
plugin.summary: Plugin to provide windvane like autopilot
plugin.author: Jon Gough
plugin.description: Windvane Autopilot is designed to use the wind instruments and autopilot on board the yatch to act like a standard windvane autopilot and allow the yatch to follow the wind.

plugin.name: Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description: Garmin, Navico and Raymarine radar support WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED! Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and older Raymarine radars. When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI). Supports MARPA (even on radars that do not support this themselves), Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, and various radar dependent features such as dual radar range and Doppler.

plugin.name: Watchdog
plugin.summary: Implement watchdog ability for opencpn
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Multiple Configurable alarms for changing conditions for boundaries, cog, landfall, ais, wind, nmea, weather, pypilot, wind, deadman, etc.

plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.summary: Pypilot PlugIn for OpenCPN
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. The plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, calibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following logic, consider the autopilot route plugin.

plugin.name: TideFinder
plugin.summary: Tidal HW/LW prediction into the future

plugin.description: Extends the tidal predictions of OpenCPN using a calendar to allow easier future predictions.
